blogPost.excerpt: With embed.so, you just need to upload a video, and you will get the embed code in minutes. Place the code to your website, and see the video gets displayed 🤩 It's time to upgrade your website, make it more personal and engaging! 💪
blogPost.body: With embed.so, you just need to upload a video, and you will get the embed code in minutes. Place the code to your website, and see the video gets displayed 🤩 It's time to upgrade your website, make it more personal and engaging! 💪
blogPost.title: embed.so - Embed videos to make your website more personal and engaging
blogPost.author: Damon Chen

localize.description: 有了embed.so，你只需要上传一个视频，你会在几分钟内得到嵌入代码。将代码放置到您的网站，并看到视频显示🤩现在是时候升级您的网站，使其更加个性化和吸引人! 💪
localize.tagline: 嵌入视频，使您的网站更加个性化和吸引人。

localize.description: 有了embed.so，你只需要上傳一個視頻，你會在幾分鐘內得到嵌入代碼。將代碼放置到您的網站，並看到視頻顯示🤩現在是時候升級您的網站，使其更加個性化和吸引人! 💪
localize.tagline: 嵌入視頻，使您的網站更加個性化和吸引人。

previous.excerpt: One-of-a-kind portrait, landscape and abstract artworks created by Artificial Intelligence. Each artwork is minted as a non-fungible token (NFT) on Ethereum's own blockchain.
previous.title: AImade.art 2.0 - Crypto art created by Artificial Intelligence

localize.description: 人工智能创作的独一无二的肖像、风景和抽象艺术作品。每件艺术品都是作为Ethereum自己的区块链上的非可替换代币（NFT）铸造的。
localize.tagline: 人工智能创造的加密艺术

localize.description: 人工智能創作的獨一無二的肖像、風景和抽象藝術作品。每件藝術品都是作爲Ethereum自己的區塊鏈上的非可替換代幣（NFT）鑄造的。
localize.tagline: 人工智能創造的加密藝術

next.excerpt: Make your user interface a little bit better by receiving weekly UI/UX insights. If you're a developer, solo-founder, product manager, or you feel the pain of user interface design this newsletter is specially for you.
next.title: UserInterface.io - Weekly UI/UX tips in your inbox for free

localize.description: 通过接收每周的UI/UX见解，让你的用户界面变得更好一点。如果你是开发者、独创者、产品经理，或者你感受到了用户界面设计的痛苦，这本时事通讯是专门为你准备的。
localize.tagline: 每周在您的收件箱中免费发送UI/UX提示。

localize.description: 通過接收每週的UI/UX見解，讓你的用戶界面變得更好一點。如果你是開發者、獨創者、產品經理，或者你感受到了用戶界面設計的痛苦，這本時事通訊是專門爲你準備的。
localize.tagline: 每週在您的收件箱中免費發送UI/UX提示。
